a passionate Technical Generalist with +6 years of experience in Mechanical Design Engineering.

Width of my technical knowlendge and my drive to find solutions to technical dilemmas will become crucial for your team to achieve objectives.

sections.title: General Story
sections.text:
Even before I graduated from Peter The Great Polytechnical University with Bachelor's degree in Robotics, I sought an opportunity to build up my engineering skills by joining my faculty's Robotics Lab.

Consequent employments lead me through positions of:
- mechanical design developer,
- small team leader (4 pers.),
- project launch support (+4000 parts)
and various maintenance and service roles.

sections.title: Shift in Career
sections.text:
Overtime it became more apparent to me that I can grow beyond what I already knew. Also, the unforeseen circumstances of today are moving me to look for new opportunities and to change my understanding of self and and my role in productive processes.

I believe that I can widen a teams' qualifications thanks to my ability to look beyond divisions of technical fields.

sections.title: Backend technologies
sections.text:
So for the last three years (if one doesn't count time in the university) I've been building up knowledge of OOP and Python.

I had built a couple of utilities for myself (like PyModoro and ChormeisterBot) and for job-related stuff (like forming all the specifications needed push huge projects in production).

Tools that I used to achieve my goals were:
Python3, Git, PySimpleGUI, Python-Telegram-Bot library, PostgreSQL, SQLite

sections.title: Frontend technologies
sections.text:
In more recent time, I've directed my attention to web-technologies and tools that really propagate IT products to the end users:

- JavaScript

This page is written completely by me.
